scripts.obfuscate-app: javascript-obfuscator wwwroot/js/app.js --output wwwroot/js/app.min.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.75 --self-defending true
scripts.obfuscate-register: javascript-obfuscator wwwroot/js/register.js --output wwwroot/js/register.min.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.75 --self-defending true
scripts.obfuscate-transfer: javascript-obfuscator wwwroot/js/transfer.js --output wwwroot/js/transfer.min.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.75 --self-defending true
scripts.obfuscate-password: javascript-obfuscator wwwroot/js/change-password.js --output wwwroot/js/change-password.min.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.75 --self-defending true
scripts.obfuscate-verify: javascript-obfuscator wwwroot/js/verify-email.js --output wwwroot/js/verify-email.min.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.75 --self-defending true
scripts.obfuscate-account-transactions: javascript-obfuscator wwwroot/js/account-transactions.js --output wwwroot/js/account-transactions.min.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.75 --self-defending true

scripts.obfuscate-all: npm run obfuscate-app && npm run obfuscate-register && npm run obfuscate-transfer && npm run obfuscate-password && npm run obfuscate-verify && npm run obfuscate-account-transactions && npm run obfuscate-admin-transactions
